record.description: Reunion in 1929 of the 1899 Championship Chicago Team. Group on benches, first row: William Eldridge, Dr. Ralph Hamill (captain), Walter S. Kennedy, Jonathan Webb, and James Sheldon; second row: A. A. Stagg, J. Wellington, Fred Slaker, Charles G. Flanagan, Kellogg Speed, James Henry, H. F. Ahlswede, and E. W. Place; third row: Dr. A. B. Snider, James Garfield MacNab, Bert Cassels, and Edward Rich.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption, photographer and pr stamps.
